Welcome to OreSat Linux App Framework's documentation!
======================================================

OreSat Linux App Framework (aka OLAF) is a pythonic application framework for all OreSat Linux boards.

What is OreSat?
---------------

OreSat is a open source CubeSat from Oregon by PSAS (Portland State Aerospace
Society).

.. note::

    If you are looking for more info on OreSat, go checkout https://www.oresat.org/
